snippet.title: MY ADAPTATION IN(TO) HUMAN - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
MY ADAPTATION IN(TO) HUMAN is a horror point and click novel in which you play as an alien body snatcher.

GAME'S KEY FEATURES:
- A unique visual style made entirely of photographs.
- An original story in which you play the role of a monster who has captured someone else's body.
- A short and dynamic story about the life of an alien creature.
- Easy to learn combat system.

WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2967860/MY_ADAPTATION_INTO_HUMAN/
